## \_getFirstDayOfWeek() function

Get the first day of a specified week

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getFirstDayOfWeek(date?: Immutable<Date>): Date;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | Immutable&lt;Date&gt; | A date with the desired week |
